caseTitle: Aman Ullah v. United Bank Limited thr. President, Karachi & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 2 (xxxiii) & Section 33 of Industrial Relations Act 2012. (2)  Nomenclature of post is not relevant for determination of status of employee whether he is performing the duties of a worker/workman or manager/supervisor. (3) The burden lies on the employee to prove that he is workman/worker if denied by the employer.
